raise_skeleton.name: Raise Skeleton
raise_skeleton.description: Animates inert bones into a temporary skeletal servant.

raise_skeletal_mage.name: Raise Skeletal Mage
raise_skeletal_mage.description: Summons a skeletal mage from ethereal bone fragments to serve you.
raise_skeletal_mage.cast_message: {caster_name} draws arcane sigils in the air...

summon_spirit_wolf.name: Summon Spirit Wolf
summon_spirit_wolf.description: Calls forth an ethereal wolf to fight by your side.

summon_fire_imp.name: Summon Fire Imp
summon_fire_imp.description: Summons a mischievous, fire-hurling imp from another plane.
summon_fire_imp.cast_message: {caster_name} traces a sigil of fire in the air...

summon_stone_golem.name: Summon Stone Golem
summon_stone_golem.description: Animates raw earth and rock into a loyal, lumbering guardian.
summon_stone_golem.cast_message: {caster_name} slams their hands on the ground, and the earth begins to churn...
